channel.title: Posts on Minimo
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Minimo

item.title: What is a website for?
item.description: Can I still change this? I am making this website to: [a] experiment with making a website [b] write a little about the projects I’ve worked on [c] link the projects to repositories I developed for them [d] share occassional advice or thoughts about science & technology Most of my software experience pertains to either running equipment, performing data analysis (primarily on images), or running simulations. Websites are new to me – at least on the development side :) I read a little about a few different static site generators, and decided that Hugo would be the most fun to learn.
